newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 20.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi businessman Prince al-Waleed donates 20 million riyals to several Saudi groups.
- Saudi Industry and Electricity Ministry permits the setting up of 65 industrial projects with total investment of one billion riyals.
- Saudi Arabia will soon open King Fahd airport in the Eastern Province, defence minister says.
- Saudi traders seek to buy rice from other resources after India and Pakistan hiked their rice prices.
